TagManagerInputExtension.InputChangeTriggerDescription: Triggered when the value of an input element changes.
TagManagerInputExtension.InputValueVariableDescription: Gets the value of an input element.
TagManagerInputExtension.InputChangeTriggerSelectionMethodDescrip: Select the method to find the input elements.
TagManagerInputExtension.InputChangeTriggerCssSelectorDescription: The CSS selector to find the input elements.
TagManagerInputExtension.InputChangeTriggerElementIDDescription: The ID of the input element.
TagManagerInputExtension.InputChangeElementVariableDescription: The input element that triggered the event.
TagManagerInputExtension.InputChangeElementIdVariableDescription: The ID of the input element that triggered the event.
TagManagerInputExtension.InputChangeElementClassesVariableDescrip: The classes of the input element that triggered the event.
TagManagerInputExtension.InputChangeNodeNameVariableDescription: The node name of the input element that triggered the event.
TagManagerInputExtension.InputChangeValueVariableDescription: The value of the input element that triggered the event.
TagManagerInputExtension.InputValueVariableSelectionMethodDescrip: Select the method to find the input elements.
TagManagerInputExtension.InputValueVariableCssSelectorDescription: The CSS selector to find the input elements.
TagManagerInputExtension.InputValueVariableElementIDDescription: The ID of the input element.
